title: Empowered Women of Social Media: Finding Global Unity in Social Communities
description: Empowered Women of Social Media: Finding Global Unity in Social Communities is an inspiring anthology and part of the "Empowered Women of Social Media" series. Women struggle and suffer in life because they hold back burning stories buried deep within. In this book over 30 women came together and formed a cohesive team. Each story will uplift you as you read about struggles and survival. Some of these authors built million dollar businesses using just social media, while others used social networking to find love.  Social communities are formed through Facebook, Google, Twitter and many other networks. Each author in this book is part of a Facebook group called the "Women's Empowerment Network". They each found one another through a social community.  Inside of this Kindle book you will find many areas where you see yourself in the story. When you see yourself in a struggle or other life issue, take a moment to reflect on your life as it is today. Compiled by Carla Wynn Hall and Denise Thompson, #1 International Bestselling Authors of Empowered Women of Social Media, Empowered Women of Social Media: Finding Global Unity in Social Communities is a book for all women, young women, grandmothers, mothers, sisters and daughters who want to write their story. Rise up and write your story too.  Our programs not only help and support new authors as they write, but they help to develop highly educated and motivated women.
author: Carla Wynn Hall
